api_list.api_description: Returns matches found by comparing the search key to the ITIS common names, scientific names, and TSNs.
Retrieve sunrise and sunset times for a specific location based on latitude and longitude.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the location in decimal degrees.

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the location in decimal degrees.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format or relative formats such as 'today'. Defaults to today.

optional_parameters.name: timezone
optional_parameters.description: Timezone of the returned times. Defaults to the location's timezone.

query: Can you find any taxonomic information for 'pine' and also provide the sunrise and sunset times in Los Angeles today?

api_list.api_description: Gets a list of ITIS Terms from a common or scientific name match.

required_parameters.name: srchKey
required_parameters.description: The search key for ITIS terms.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve sunrise and sunset times for a specific location based on latitude and longitude.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the location in decimal degrees.

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the location in decimal degrees.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format or relative formats such as 'today'. Defaults to today.

optional_parameters.name: timezone
optional_parameters.description: Timezone of the returned times. Defaults to the location's timezone.

query: Provide me the ITIS terms for 'Eagle' and also the sunrise and sunset times in London today.
